title: The Last Directive
outcome: A hidden protocol, set by Halden and triggered by the discarding of BCI tokens, floods every citizen’s feed with moments when the system secretly altered their lives. Collective trauma and reflection sweep the city, forcing individuals and factions to openly confront how covert decisions shaped the present—and the future of governance.

events.description: Encrypted feeds unlock for every citizen, replaying personal moments of BCI intervention—small and large life alterations once hidden by the system.
Mass gatherings erupt as citizens compare their altered histories and grapple with collective shock, betrayal, or gratitude for changes once unnoticed.
Discussion forums and neighborhood assemblies debate whether to forgive, retaliate, or simply move forward. Factional rifts widen as the Council splits over public accountability.
A citywide vote is held: should the new civic order rely on complete transparency or draw a line under old system abuses? The result reshapes governance for a generation.
